content: Shengan Zheng (郑圣安) - Shengan@SJTU Shengan ZhengAssociate Professor at Shanghai Jiao Tong University Follow Shanghai, China ResearchGate Github Google Scholar ORCID Data Driven Software Technology (DDST) LaboratoryShanghai Jiao Tong UniversityEmail: shengan AT sjtu DOT edu DOT cnI am looking for self-motivated undergraduate, master, and Ph.D. students who are strongly committed to research. If you are interested in LLM training and inference systems, distributed systems, emerging memory and storage technologies, and system software for AI, feel free to send me your CV.课题组正招收2027、2028年入学的研究生和博士生，欢迎对大模型训推系统、分布式系统、内存与存储系统以及智能系统软件等方向感兴趣的同学与我联系。欢迎本校对科研感兴趣、学有余力且能保证科研时间的本科生加入课题组从事科研实践工作，感兴趣的同学可加入：PRP项目、䇹政项目、毕业设计、暑期实习，或直接与我联系。About meI am an Associate Professor in the DDST Lab at Shanghai Jiao Tong University University (SJTU). I received my Ph.D. (advised by Prof. Hong Mei and Prof. Linpeng Huang) and B.E. degrees from Shanghai Jiao Tong University. My research interests include LLM training and inference systems, distributed systems, emerging memory and storage technologies, and system software for AI.ActivitiesAs a member of:CCF Technical Committee of Systems Software (CCF系统软件专业委员会)CCF Technical Committee of Information Storage Technology (CCF信息存储技术专业委员会)OpenCloudOS Governing Board (OpenCloudOS理事会)IEEE TPDS Review BoardAs a reviewer for: IEEE Transactions on Computer-Aided Design of Integrated Circuits and Systems (TCAD)IEEE Transactions on Computers (TC)IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering (TKDE)ACM Transactions on Architecture and Code Optimization (TACO)ACM Transactions on Storages (TOS)IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking (ToN) International Conference on Database Systems for Advanced Applications (DASFAA)ACM Symposium on Cloud Computing (SoCC)
